mapper.sql: ELEMENT_ID, ELEMENT_NAME, MENU_CODE, ELEMENT_CODE, ELEMENT_TYPE, READONLY_FLAG, URL_ADDR, ELEMENT_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(m.ELEMENT_ID) ,m.* FROM SYS_ELEMENT m LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION_ELEMENT_REL pmr ON pmr.ELEMENT_CODE = m.ELEMENT_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION p ON p.PERMISSION_CODE = pmr.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION_REF rpr ON rpr.PERMISSION_CODE = p.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.ROLE_CODE = rpr.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF prr on prr.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_USER_POSITION_REF upr on upr.POSITION_CODE=prr.POSITION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u ON u.USER_CODE = upr.USER_CODE WHERE m.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND pmr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND p.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND rpr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND r.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND prr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND upr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.ACCOUT = #{accout}
